creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
text:
JMeter displays german text on my computer (probably because my OS is german ;-
). Several menu items/labels are not translated and still are in english, e.g.: 
(trailing -> is my proposal)

Run each Thread Group seperately -> Jede Thread Gruppe separat ausführen
Timer -> Zeitgeber
Counter -> Zähler
...

But what's even more frightening is the sometimes awful translation to german, 
e.g.: (trailing -> is my proposal)

Kontroller (Controller) -> Steuerung
Lauscher (Listener) -> Empfänger
Konfigurations Element () -> Konfigurationslement
...

I noticed that the ApacheJMeter_core.jar has the language bundles 
(messages_de.properties). if you like, i would enhance the german message 
bundle for you ... ?






Selecting a different language doesn't do anything.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The Language option works for me, but only partially. The pop-up menu items do 
seem to change immediately; other items seem to keep the language of the item 
that was first (or maybe just previously) created.

E.g. 
Set English
Create Thread Group - English
Set German
Create Thread Group - German name, but otherwise English
Create Login Config - German
Set English
Create Login Config - German.

Looks like the settings are partially sticky; best to change it early!

Feel free to attach an updated properties file ...

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Forgot to say - some of the diplayed strings are still hard-coded, rather than 
fetched from properties.

These will get fixed in due course (and then we'll need some more 
translations...)

okay, i'll better wait for all GUI strings to be retrieved dynamically. then, 
i'll be happy to translate them. :-)
